"use client" import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" const YEAR = new Date().getFullYear() const LINKS = [ { title: "Home", href: "#" }, { title: "About Us", href: "#" }, { title: "Blog", href: "#" }, { title: "Service", href: "#" }, ] export default function Footers03() { return (

Copyright © {YEAR} Creative Tim

    {LINKS.map(({ title, href }, key) => (
  • {title}
    • ))}
) }

meta.details: Try this footer example with navigation links, copyright notice, and CTA button, built with shadcn/ui components for balanced design and accessibility.
